data.description_html:
When you cast this spell, you invoke the power of souls unborn to reinforce the recipient's essentia pool.
The creature touched gains 1 point of temporary essentia for every three caster levels, to a maximum of 5 points of essentia at caster level 15th.
These temporary essentia points can be used just like normal essentia points for as long as soul boon lasts.
Material Component: An empty insect cocoon.
data.name: Soul Boon
